title: Life after Twitter? Here are alternatives for anyone looking to leave
description: The best alternatives to Twitter for people who don't want to stay on the Elon Musk-owned site.

title: Threads app surges to 10M users, Zuckerberg says of Twitter rival
description: Instagram is branding the new app as a conversation-first text platform with big ambitions. Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg wants it to leapfrog Elon Musk's Twitter.

title: What to know about Bluesky, as Dril and AOC join the new Twitter alternative
description: The Jack Dorsey-backed Bluesky app could be Twitter’s doppleganger and has drawn some of Twitter’s bigger names.

title: A guide to getting started with Twitter alternative Mastodon
description: How to get started on social-media site Mastodon, whether you're leaving Twitter or just looking for people who have.

title: Will China overtake the U.S. on AI? Probably not. Here’s why.
description: As Congress considers how to regulate the use of artificial intelligence, some worry that constraints on American companies will allow Chinese ones to get ahead.
